def_en: When a solid substance melts or when you melt it, it changes to a liquid, usually because it has been heated.
If something such as your feelings melt, they suddenly disappear and you no longer feel them.

def_cn: 逐渐融入(黑暗、人群等);与…融为一体
def_en: If a person or thing melts into something such as darkness or a crowd of people, they become difficult to see, for example because they are moving away from you or are the same colour as the background.
If someone or something melts your heart, or if your heart melts, you start to feel love or sympathy towards them.

def_cn: （带鱼或肉的）奶酪三明治
def_en: A melt is a piece of bread which has meat or fish on it, and melted cheese on top.
